evidence.text: mediation of this case that took place on Monday, October 28, 2024, resulted in a full and final settlement of all claims as to all parties
the proposed settlement in this matter was presented to the City Commission in a closed‑door session on November 19, 2024, was approved by City officials

extracted.value: November 19, 2024: settlement approved by City officials

evidence.text: will now be brought before the City Commission on a public agenda tentatively set for December 3, 2024 for final approval

extracted.value: December 3, 2024: settlement approved by City Commission

evidence.text: The parties shall file the appropriate settlement documentation with the Court on or before December 17, 2024
This settlement requires final consideration and approval by the City of Fort Lauderdale City Commission.
